BR_text.BRsummary: Readme editor's text input div in dashboard not filling the entire parent div.
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
 
 The dashboard's Readme editor do not let you click to edit within the entire text box only the first line. I believe this worked as expected a couple of months ago but I could be wrong.
 It seems to be the this div that does not fill the entire parent div.
 div.react-mde.react-mde-tabbed-layout div.mde-text div.DraftEditor-root div.DraftEditor-editorContainer div.notranslate.public-DraftEditor-content
 <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 Try to edit an experiment or project Readme text.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 One can click inside the entire text field to start entering text not only a small part of it.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 Polyaxon 0.4.0 with Firefox 66.0b10

comments_0.comment_text: there was a style issue, should be fixed in v0.4.1.
